I will never forget this amazing dining experience.My advice? Make your reservations today.  Do it.  The Catalan food was so good that we stayed there until they closed.  My wife and I spent three weeks touring around Europe (France, Switzerland, Italy, Spain) and this was the best place at which we ate. That includes the incredible culinary delights of Paris and Burgandy. We ALMOST couldn't find the restaurant.  It's in a tiny square.  It's a very romantic place.If you go here, eat something with duck liver in it.
